alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 4:42AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Feliciana, northern Pointe Coupee and western East Feliciana Parishes through 530 AM CDT... At 440 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayou Current, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, St. Francisville, Morganza, Wakefield, Lettsworth, Spillman and Batchelor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm and could produce an inch of rain in 30 minutes. This may produce temporary ponding of water on roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana
